title: Mortimer Beckett and the Time Paradox BETA [H33T][windy9009]
description:
I&#039;VE PLAYED IT MORE THAN ONE HOUR DIDN&#039;T SEE ANY TIME LIMIT BUT IT ALLOWS ONLY TWO CHAPTERS, IT WAS FUN CAN&#039;T WAIT THE FINAL VERSION,
JUST INSTALL AND PLAY!

Just as Mortimer solves the mystery of Spooky Manor, another begins! Join Mortimer in a time-traveling adventure through different time eras and locations. Interact with characters that need your help, solve new, fun puzzles, and hop through time!

System requirements:
Windows 98, ME, 2K, XP, Vista
500 Mhz
128 MB RAM
